1.caption_en:
Platform architecture diagram (v4.1) for an Airbnb-like marketplace showing consumers (Traveller), producers (Host) and partners (Cleaning Service) with user activities and a layered architecture of ecosystem, engagement, intelligence, and infrastructure components.

{
  "type": "platform_architecture_diagram",
  "title": "PLATFORM ARCHITECTURE",
  "version": "v4.1",
  "platform_name": "AirBnB",
  "logos": [
    "PIK",
    "fastbreak.one",
    "AWS"
  ],
  "users": {
    "consumers": [
      "Traveller"
    ],
    "producers": [
      "Host"
    ],
    "partners": [
      "Cleaning Service"
    ]
  },
  "key_activities": {
    "consumers": [
      "Onboarding",
      "Transaction",
      "Matchmaking",
      "Engagement"
    ],
    "producers": [
      "Onboarding",
      "Transaction",
      "Matchmaking",
      "Engagement"
    ],
    "partners": [
      "Matchmaking",
      "Transaction"
    ]
  },
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "Ecosystem Layer",
      "description": "How users connect their systems/devices to the platform",
      "components": [
        "APIs to reservation systems",
        "Notebook / PC",
        "Smartphone"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Engagement Layer",
      "description": "User touchpoints and applications/systems the user interacts with",
      "components": [
        "Digital Keys",
        "Web UI",
        "Mobile App",
        "Listing service",
        "Pricing Service",
        "Search Service",
        "Booking Service",
        "Payment Service"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Intelligence Layer",
      "description": "Components for data analytics, machine learning and AI",
      "components": [
        "Event Streaming",
        "Change Data capture",
        "Bulk Data import",
        "Block Store",
        "EMR Batch processing",
        "Workflow Scheduling"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Infrastructure Layer",
      "description": "Components for data storage, application hosting and physical elements",
      "components": [
        "Cluster management",
        "Storage",
        "Instance management",
        "Network"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "notes": "High-level representation of an Airbnb-style platform architecture and its primary services and infrastructure components."
}
